automation-rules-basics.title: Automation Rules
automation-rules-basics.content: Create trigger-based rules to automatically generate tasks when specific events occur (hearing updated, document uploaded, case stage changed).

task-templates-intro.title: Task Templates
task-templates-intro.content: Pre-configured task sets for common legal workflows. Templates ensure consistency and save time when creating repetitive task sequences.

escalation-matrix-basics.title: Escalation Matrix
escalation-matrix-basics.content: Automatic escalation of overdue tasks to supervisors with configurable SLA thresholds and notification channels.

task-bundles-concept.title: Task Bundles
task-bundles-concept.content: Groups of related tasks that are created together for specific case stages, with optional sequence requirements and dependencies.

ai-task-suggestions.title: AI Task Assistant
ai-task-suggestions.content: Intelligent task creation based on case context, deadline analysis, and workload optimization for your team.

automation-triggers.title: Automation Triggers
automation-triggers.content: System events that can start automation rules: Case Created, Hearing Updated, Document Uploaded, Task Overdue, Stage Changed.
